mdRecord.dcterms:description: One of the first garden-style apartment complexes in the United States and the first large-scale rental housing project to be financed by a mortgage issue by the Federal Housing Administration. According to a long-time resident, “Young brides in Washington set their marriage dates by (when) their applications for an apartment in the village (were accepted).” -- http://activerain.com/blogsview/1007517/arlington-va-neighborhoods-colonial-village. [work]
